articles.author: Henry Foy, Sam Jones
articles.title: US allies condemn Trump's 'irresponsible' Russia remarks - Financial Times
articles.description: EU foreign policy chief and German president denounce threats against Nato made by Republican frontrunner
articles.content: The EUs chief diplomat and Germanys president joined other western leaders in condemning former US president Donald Trumps suggestion that he would allow Russia to attack any Nato member that failed … [+3298 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Hawkins, Joshua Hawkins
articles.title: The Milky Way's black hole is warping space-time - BGR
articles.description: New research shows that the Milky Way's supermassive black hole is spinning so fast it's warping space-time around it.
